title: Andy Warstar - Previous Bands (Orchidalgia & The Hinge)
description:
Andy Warstar&#039;s Previous Bands:

1) Orchidalgia - (means pain in the testicles) Back in 1991 when Andy Warstar was just out of high school, he renamed himself Michael Vile, and formed this noise punk band with some kids from Molalla, OR (home of the Molalla Buckeroo rodeo). The band only lasted a month, but almost everything got recorded. The line-up was as follows:

Michael Vile - drums, guitar, vocals
Dale Hickey - guitar, vocals
Casey Scrotum - guitar, bass, vocals
Tammy Cuntrag - drums, recorder, vocals

The tape was released with the title "Flying Monkey Butts & Purple Violins". It has since been retitled "Toilet Bowl - Monkey Butts Revisited" as it has been remastered and stuff.

2) The Hinge - A year after Orchidalgia, Andy Warstar went to northern Idaho to go to the U of I during the height of the grunge era. While he was trapped amidst wheat fields and missing all the cool music on the coast, he started a hippie punk band with a couple kids who answered the advertisement he put up all around school (which read "ever want to snort coke with Def Leppard? then this band is for you!)

Although the band played three gigs and was together for about a year, the drummer never wanted to record much. Andy Warstar, then known as just Mike, insisted, and so here, you get both demo tapes combined into one full album. the line-up was as follows:

Mike 1 (Mike Tysoe) - guitar, vocals
Mike 2 (Mike Liles)- drums
Joshua Boyd - bass guitar

*************************

so there&#039;s everything that got recorded by Andy Warstar prior to becoming Andy Warstar and playing with Andy Warstar and the Warstars. Enjoy...

google andy warstar - visit www.andywarstar.com - for the warheads!
